Columbia recieved $1.3 billion in federal grants and contracts in fiscal year 2025

Of the total grant and contract revenue, $972 million were from direct funding for research expenses, and $341 million were from indirect cost reimbursements.

Research expenses

Direct funding

$972M

$972M

Total grant and

contract revenue

$1.3B

Operations and maintenance,

depreciation, and interest

$137M

Indirect cost reimbursements

$341M

Net surplus reserved

for central administration

$204M

Note: A portion of grant and contract revenue were not used towards research expenses. Private grants and contracts that also funded research expenses are not shown in this graphic.

Source: Columbia University Financial Reports

Graphic by Melinda Yao
